title: VITA - Hipolito Yrigoyen
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery
description: Vegan restaurant/cafe located in downtown city center. Serves cakes, muffins, and cupcakes plus raw food items, salads, sandwiches, and hot dishes. Breakfast options include granola and whole wheat muffins. Try the organic coffee with cashew milk.
